pr_title: Remove nextToken from ModelPagination since nextToken is never exposed

timeline.message: Remove nextToken from ModelPagination since nextToken is never exposed anyway
Remove nextToken from ModelPagination since nextToken is never exposed anyway
Add AWSApiPluginTest for making a paginated query

Fix bug introduced in #540, caught by unit test

`null` is no longer a valid value for a QueryPredicate. QueryPredicates.all() should be used instead now.  Because `null` was still used, an IllegalStateException: Invalid predicate type error was thrown

timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
jamesonwilliams

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to have a paginated result, that has no request associated with it?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: Yes, if nextToken is null (the last page), then the requestForNextResult will also be null
replies.author: richardmcclellan
